thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Karen

author: Karen
title: Karen
text: I refer many of my customers to Thriftbooks.com to purchase used books I do not have in my used bookstore. I am pleased with the variety, stock, and quality of the used books available. Typically, their condition rating is spot on. If not, once contacted, I receive a refund due to my longevity and frequent purchases. I often buy books to satisfy customer needs and am pleased with Thrift books.
